David Majak Chan (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2000) bụ onye South Sudan na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere.

Majak malitere ọrụ ya na otu Kenya Kakamega Homeboyz. N'afọ 2019, Majak bịanyere aka na Tusker na Kenya, ebe a na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ na-emepụta asambodo ọmụmụ. N'afọ 2021, ọ bịanyere aka na klọb ụgbọ elu kachasị elu nke Sweden bụ Kalmar. Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e zigara Majak na IFK Luleå na ngalaba nke atọ nke Sweden.
O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Kenya na mba ụwa, ebe ọ biri ebe ahụ ihe karịrị afọ 12.
